name: CI Orchestrator
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "python -m ci_orchestrator.main install || true; python -m tools.strict_score_guard --phase synthesize --if-missing --json reports/strict_score.json"
postStartCommand: bash -lc "python -m ci_orchestrator.main test || true; python -m tools.strict_score_guard --phase synthesize --if-missing --json reports/strict_score.json"
